overview: What man doesn't dream of a horny young girl waking him up with a blowjob ? It is exactly what Anastasia and Leda love to do! Of course their "victims" wake up and what happens next ? Meanwhile Luciana has a very special way to thank the painter for his services and Eva climbs on top of a ping pong table to offer her tight little behind to Hugo. Something he obviously can't refuse!
title: Beauty and the Senior 2
